prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rockbridge (Va.) County Records, circa 1787-1950, undated. Local government records collection, Rockbridge County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These boxes came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of records from Rockbridge County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Rockbridge County was named for Natural Bridge, an exceptional rock formation located in the county. The county was formed in 1778 from Augusta and Botetourt counties, and another part of Botetourt County was added in 1888.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Rockbridge (Va.) County Records, circa 1787-1950, undated, consist of the following series: Bonds/Commissions/Oaths, County Administrative Records (subfield series include Board of Supervisors Records, Overseers of the Poor Records, Sheriff's Records, Treasurer's Records, Commissioner of the Revenue Records and Board of Supervisors Records: Road and Bridge Records), Court Records (subfield series include Clerks' Records, Judgments, Jury Records, Criminal Records and Court Finance), Land Records, Organization Records, School Records, Wills, Business Records, Miscellaneous Records, Tax and Fiscal Records, Election Records, Fiduciary Records, Road and Bridge Records and Justice of the Peace Records.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Rockbridge County Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia's web site.

scopecontent.p: Bonds/Commisions/Oaths; County Administrative Records: Board of Supervisors Records, Overseers of the Poor Records, Sheriff's Records, Treasurer's Records; Court Records: Clerk's Records; Land Records; Miscellaneous Records: (Estray, 1); Organization Records, School Records, Wills (Renunciations). Usually only one or two documents per series.

Court Records: Judgments: Condemnation Records involving the Town of Buena Vista, post-1913 Judgments, Jury Records: Instructions to Juries, Criminal Records: Commonwealth Causes, Alexander v. Critcher; Bonds/Commissions/Oaths: Railroad Bonds; Business Records; Miscellaneous Records: Powers of Attorney; County Administrative Records: Commissioner of Revenue Recors: Erroneous Assessments of Land; Tax and Fiscal Records: Land Sold for Taxes.

Court Records: Judgments, Clerks' Correspondence; Land Records; Ejectments; County Administrative Records: Board of Supervisors Records: Road and Bridge Records; Tax and Fiscal Records, (Unprocessed.)

Court Records: Court Finance: Fees Collected by Trial Justices in Civil Cases, 1934-1936, Financial Statements of Clerk Circuit Court, 1936-1945; Fines Imposed and Paid into Courts, 1895,1907-1908, 1912; Miscellaneous Records, 1888, 1874,1891,1859; Court Finance: Moneys Deposited by Order of Court, 1926; Tax and Fiscal Records: Forfeiture of Automobiles; Miscellaneous Records: Report of Automobile Accidents, 1926-1933; Criminal Records: Lists of Convicts, 1876,1882,1914,1922-1924, Pardons, 1904-1938, Criminal Records, 1870-1912; Prisoners in Jail, 1896-1926.

Court Records: Judgments: Lexington Lumber Corporation vs. Town of Lexington and others, 1933 (1 plat), See also Barcode Number 1154869, Judgments/Condemnations: North River Navigation Co. vs. John Glasgow, 1852 (1 plat); North River Navigation Co. vs. David Laird (1 plat), James J. Thompson (1 plat), and John Jordan (1 plat), all 1852; Clerk's Records: Clerk's Fee Book, 1787-1790; Land Records: Petition of Natural Bridge Company, 1907 (blueprint of dam); Election Records: Polls for District Officers, 1893.

Land Records; Fiduciary Records; Road and Bridge Records; Justice of the Peace Records; Business Records; Election Records, Tax and Fiscal Records; Bonds/Commissions/Oaths; Court Records: Clerks' Records, Judgment Related Documents (subpoenas, warrants, notices), Partially processed.
